aboutDescription.message: TabMark is a clean and efficient bookmark management extension that helps you better organize and access your web collections.

version.description: The version number of the application

settingsUpdateTip.message: You can set background color, wallpaper, floating ball, site recommendations, link opening method, clean up invalid bookmarks...

quickLinksDescription.message: When enabled, your most frequently visited websites will be displayed below the search box for easy access. The recommendation list will automatically update as you visit new sites.

sidebarFeaturesFeature.message:
Two new features added:
1. Quick Sidebar:
Press Alt/Command + B on any webpage to open the sidebar for quick access to bookmarks and search features.

2. Link Opening Settings:
Customize how bookmarks and quick links are opened in settings, with the option to open in new tabs.
sidebarFeaturesFeature.description: Unified tip for sidebar search and link opening features

searchEngineUpdateFeature.message:
Search engine switching feature has been updated:
1. Click the search icon to set the default search engine
2. Support for custom search engines
3. Use the tab bar for temporary switching of the current search

donateDescription.message: If you find TabMark useful, please consider supporting its continued development. Your contribution helps us improve the extension and add new features.

scanQRCodeToDonate.description: Text for scanning QR code to donate

donateListLink.description: Link text to view donation list

customTabFeature.message:
New custom tab features:
1. You can now customize the content displayed on your homepage in the "Layout Settings" tab
2. Choose to hide or show the search box, welcome message, and footer
3. Customize which quick access links are displayed
4. Adjust the bookmark container width for your preferred layout
5. In "Search Settings", you can choose whether to display history and bookmark suggestions
6. Added a "Donate" option where you can support development through WeChat if you like this extension
customTabFeature.description: Information about the custom tab feature

wheelSwitchingTab.description: Wheel switching tab name in settings

wheelSwitchingDescription.message: When wheel switching is enabled, you can quickly switch between pinned folders by scrolling the mouse wheel in non-bookmark list areas of the main page

enableWheelSwitching.description: Option to enable wheel switching feature

shortcutsSettingsDescription.message: Customize shortcut keys for quick access

sidebarShortcutDescription.message: Quickly open the sidebar panel for quick access
sidebarShortcutDescription.description: Description of the sidebar shortcut functionality

shortcutsTip.message: Click the "Configure Shortcuts" button to go to Chrome's extension shortcuts settings page for customization

shortcutsFeature.message:
New features:
1. Sidebar shortcut customization: You can now customize the shortcut to open or close the sidebar in Chrome extension shortcuts settings
2. In Settings > Shortcuts, you can quickly jump to Chrome's shortcut settings page
3. Two-way control: Press the same shortcut to open or close the sidebar for more convenience

Custom tab features:
1. You can now customize the content displayed on your homepage in the "Layout Settings" tab
2. Choose to hide or show the search box, welcome message, and footer
3. Customize which quick access links are displayed
4. Adjust the bookmark container width for your preferred layout
5. In "Search Settings", you can choose whether to display history and bookmark suggestions
6. Added a "Donate" option where you can support development through WeChat if you like this extension
shortcutsFeature.description: Information about the shortcuts customization feature

searchResultsOpeningTitle.description: Title for search results opening method settings

openSearchInNewTab.message: Open Search Results in New Tab
openSearchInNewTab.description: Option to open search results in new tab

searchSuggestionsFeature.message:
Version 1.245 Updates:
1. Fixed search all engines: Now Cmd/Ctrl+Enter search includes the default search engine
2. Added search results opening method settings: Choose to open search results in new tab or current page
3. Added bookmark card height customization: Adjust the height of bookmark cards to your preference
4. Fixed multiple UI issues for better user experience

bookmarkCardHeightTitle.description: Title for bookmark card height settings

sidePanelLinkOpeningTitle.description: Title for side panel link opening settings

sidePanelLinkOpeningDescription.message: Configure how bookmarks and quick links are opened when clicked in the side panel
sidePanelLinkOpeningDescription.description: Description for side panel link opening settings

sidePanelOpenInSidepanel.description: Option to open links within the side panel
